com.dreamoval.android.pixtern.card

Class CardRealtimeActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.dreamoval.android.pixtern.card.CardRealtimeActivity

  • public class CardRealtimeActivity
extends Activity
    Class that opens the Android camera and provides the functionality to take a picture for the card validation.
